programme.title: George Abbott remembered
programme.short_synopsis: A tribute to director, theatre producer and playwright George Abbott (1887-1995).
programme.medium_synopsis: George Abbott (1887-1995), the Broadway producer and director, is remembered, from his humble beginnings as a messenger through to becoming one of America's greatest playwrights.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
